last_episode_to_air.name: The Mori Family House Sits
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kogoro receives a request from literary critic Takahiko Kamiyu to stay at his house while he goes to the countryside for three days. He plans to turn down the offer, as it doesn't seem like detective work, but for the high pay, all he has to do is look after the pet cat, and the only thing that bothers him is the noise from the construction work that starts on the second day. Kogoro accepts the favorable conditions, which include free use of alcohol and food in the house, and the right to invite Conan and Ran. However, while he is relaxing at the Kamiyu residence, one visitor after another begins to arrive...

name: Case Closed
overview: The son of a world famous mystery writer, Jimmy Kudo, has achieved his own notoriety by assisting the local police as a student detective. He has always been able to solve the most difficult of criminal cases using his wits and power of reason.

episodes.name: The Big Shrink
episodes.overview: While on a date with Rachel, Kudo is attacked by two shady thugs who slip him an experimental drug. The effects of the poison will turn Jimmy’s life upside down!

episodes.name: The Kidnapped Debutante
episodes.overview: Conan sets out to discover the fate of a wealthy businessman’s kidnapped daughter. His new identity is a secret to everyone but his eccentric inventor friend, Dr. Agasa.

episodes.name: Beware of Idols
episodes.overview: Pop diva Yoko Okino is being stalked and she's come to star-struck Richard Moore's doorstep for help! Luckily for all involved, Conan is on the job, too.

episodes.name: Fish Marks the Spot
episodes.overview: Treasure hunt! When a mysterious coded map ends up in the hands of Conan and his new friends from school, the Junior Detective League is born!

episodes.name: The Time Bomb Express
episodes.overview: On a cross country train, Conan comes across two sketchy men that might be connected to the night of his big shrink! To make matters worse, the hoods are packing a bomb!

episodes.name: Tragic Valentine
episodes.overview: When Rachel and Serena attend a Valentine’s Day dinner party with some boys, Conan decides to tag along. It’s a good thing, too, because murder is on the menu!

episodes.name: The Case of Mysterious Gifts
episodes.overview: Dr. Woodman has been receiving children’s toys - and cash - once a month for the last two years, and he has no idea why. Conan and Richard take the case and find some interesting twists along the way.

episodes.name: The Art Museum Murder Case
episodes.overview: The owner of an art museum is killed by what appears to be someone wearing medieval body armor from the 15th century. Can Conan bring the killer to justice?

episodes.name: Festival Fiasco
episodes.overview: An author scripts the perfect murder of his ex-partner, complete with an airtight alibi. Can Conan see through the holes in his plot, or has this writer penned himself a perfect happy ending?

episodes.name: Deadly Game
episodes.overview: A star soccer player's been thrown off his game. A girl claiming to be Jimmy's girlfriend has surfaced, asking for help in finding a kidnapped boy. Are the events connected?

episodes.name: The Moonlight Sonata Murder Case (1/2)
episodes.overview: There is murder abound on Moonlight Island, and with every victim that is found, the haunting sounds of a classical composition are heard. Conan must solve the crime before all the suspects disappear!

episodes.name: Kidnapped: Ayumi
episodes.overview: An innocent game of hide-and-seek becomes a race through the city when two thugs kidnap Amy. With the clock running against them, can the Junior Detective League rescue her before it's too late?

episodes.name: Mystery Mastermind
episodes.overview: Richard finds the missing father of a girl named Michelle. Unfortunately, the next day, the father is found murdered and Michelle has vanished. It’s up to Conan to find the girl before it’s too late!

episodes.name: The Shooter
episodes.overview: As Conan’s gang fishes on the riverbank, they witness a most unusual sight. Can they convince Inspector Meguire and Richard of its importance before it’s too late?

episodes.name: The Two Faced Brother
episodes.overview: When Conan has to deal with a disappearing body, an oddly similar pair of brothers, and a jaded law enforcement system, everything is helter-skelter!

episodes.name: A Loan Repaid
episodes.overview: What starts out as a lazy day soon takes an exciting turn when an antique collector meets his end by the edge of an ancient sword. Can Conan cut through all the confusion?

episodes.name: The Case of the Hi-Jacked Department Store
episodes.overview: When Conan and his pals find themselves locked in a department store, they stumble right into the hands of a vicious ring of burglars. Will anyone come to their rescue?

episodes.name: Wedding Day Blues
episodes.overview: While Conan suffers through the wedding of a former teacher, someone is plotting to poison the bride’s favorite drink! What diabolical mind is behind this act of evil?

episodes.name: Fashion Sense
episodes.overview: What began as an enjoyable day for Conan, Richard, and Rachel, who is being interviewed for a potential job as a fashion model, soon turns toxic. A beautiful young lady has been found dead!

episodes.name: The Disappearing Act
episodes.overview: Conan, George, Mitch, and Amy explore a haunted house. With strange noises and mysterious screams around every corner, what they find is more bizarre than any ghost ever imagined.

episodes.name: Lights, Camera... Murder
episodes.overview: When a crewmember is killed, a movie set becomes a crime scene! Everyone involved in the movie is labeled a suspect, but who could be capable of such a horrendous deed?

episodes.name: Smooth Sailing (1)
episodes.overview: Conan, Richard, and Rachel attempt to relax aboard a cruise ship, but the gang soon ends up being cast into the middle of a dangerous family drama. Can Conan find the killer before he takes out the entire family?

episodes.name: Smooth Sailing (2)
episodes.overview: Lucas becomes the next victim on the voyage, and it’s revealed that Theodore’s escape from his makeshift cell was only possible with an accomplice. Amid two-timing and back-stabbing, Conan’s on the case.

episodes.name: Better Off Forgotten
episodes.overview: During Richard’s day at the track, he must dodge a revenge-driven ex-con and help a beautiful woman recover her memories.

episodes.name: The Counterfeit Ransom Kidnapping
episodes.overview: A dramatic car chase leaves two people dead - or does it? What does a diving watch, a sun tan, and five million dollars add up to? Just another puzzling case for Conan.

episodes.name: Jack Attacks!
episodes.overview: A dog named Jack kills a college student, shocking the dog’s owner and Conan as well! Conan’s known the pooch forever, and if he doesn’t get to the bottom of the attack, Jack will be put to sleep!

episodes.name: Richard's Class Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Conan and Rachel join Richard for the 15-year reunion of Moore’s state-winning Judo team. But when the knock-out Jamie Hummelford turns up dead in her room, reminiscing will have to wait.

episodes.name: Richard's Class Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: Richard’s class reunion continues, and the killer is still among them. Can Conan apprehend him in time? Everyone’s a suspect in this exciting episode of Case Closed!

episodes.name: The Computer Murder
episodes.overview: A chance meeting with a corporate executive lands Conan in the middle of a murder investigation. A curious cat, a suspicious limo driver, and pile of melted chocolates have Conan wondering who the killer is.

episodes.name: The Missing Melody
episodes.overview: When an attorney’s wife is murdered under strange circumstances, Conan steps in to make sense of it all. A music box, a telephone call, and a staple all point to a killer no one would expect.

episodes.name: Murder at the Television Studio
episodes.overview: Richard Moore stars on the popular television show Prime Time Mystery Hour, and while Conan and Rachel enjoy the broadcast from the audience, a vicious murder takes place at the studio.

episodes.name: Murder at the Local Diner
episodes.overview: Rachel has a date and Conan is determined to find out who this guy is. But when a brutal murder takes place at the diner he’s in, Conan steps into his detective shoes to solve the case.

episodes.name: A Hunting We Will Go
episodes.overview: A treasure hunt turns scary for the Junior Detective League. They’re lost in the wild, miles from civilization, and two suspicious-looking men are sneaking around!

episodes.name: Mountain Villa Murder (1)
episodes.overview: When Rachel is invited to a friend’s villa, it seems like an ideal get-away from the city. But when one of the guests is murdered, the holiday turns into a nightmare - and Rachel’s the killer’s next target!

episodes.name: Mountain Villa Murder (2)
episodes.overview: A group of Rachel’s old friends seek to defend themselves against a deadly axe-murderer. But is the assailant really stalking them from outside of the villa - or is he lurking within?

episodes.name: Wrong Place at the Wrong Time
episodes.overview: When a real estate agent is murdered in his condo, the police suspect a well-known dentist in town. Will Conan’s investigation vindicate the beautiful dentist or debunk her perfect alibi?

episodes.name: Prickly Past
episodes.overview: When a pretty girl hires Detective Moore to help her find an old flame, Conan finds out that the man she is looking for was responsible for the death of her fiancé!

episodes.name: Flames of Confusion
episodes.overview: When a body is discovered in a bonfire, Moore finds out that the victim is the same man he’s been tailing for the past three days! Can Conan crack the case before the prime suspect leaves the country?

episodes.name: Billionaire Birthday Blues (1)
episodes.overview: A billionaire hosts a birthday gala for his daughter Reika and Detective Moore is the celebrity guest of honor. But when one of Reika’s suitors turns up dead, the remaining guests are suspects for murder.

episodes.name: Billionaire Birthday Blues (2)
episodes.overview: When a beautiful heiress is murdered on her birthday, Conan springs into action to solve the baffling crime. The stakes are soon raised, as Rachel becomes a target for the assassin’s sinister game.

episodes.name: Left in Tatters
episodes.overview: A baseball game is interrupted when the School Chairman reveals that someone has slashed the cherished Championship Flag! Scandal rocks Shore View High as Conan investigates.

episodes.name: Karaoke Killing
episodes.overview: Rachel and Serena find themselves in a Karaoke Bar with the hottest band in the land! It seems like a dream come true until the brash lead singer - Justin Moon - is poisoned right in front of their eyes.

episodes.name: Conan Is Kidnapped
episodes.overview: A lady who claims to be Conan’s mother might really be a spy working for the organization that poisoned him! Can Conan escape from her murderous intentions and find an antidote for the poison?

episodes.name: Unhappy Birthday
episodes.overview: A lazy drive through Chiyoda mountain, Tokyo, lands Kogoro, Ran, and Conan in the middle of a murder mystery surrounding the death of billionaire industrialist, Kosaku Hotta. As Conan tries to unravel the clues before the killer can strike again, he faces one disturbing reality. The prime suspects are the victim's children. It's an explosive whodunit you won't want to miss.

episodes.name: Unexpected Visitors
episodes.overview: Another day, another case as Kogoro stumbles upon the death of the President of a popular apparel company. Just why would the President be wearing an unflattering facial mask if she had been expecting company? It's just one of the many perplexing elements of a most unusual case.

episodes.name: A Game of Murder
episodes.overview: Conan and the gang's ski-trip turns deadly when a medical professor is murdered right under their noses. A secret message left by the victim points to one of his students as being the killer. However, unraveling the secret proves one of the greatest challenges the pint-sized sleuth has ever faced.

episodes.name: The Last Dive
episodes.overview: The bitter rivalry between two world-class high divers boils over as the reigning champion is found dead. Due to the nature of the injuries and eye witness testimony, it seems as if this death was nothing more than a tragic accident. But nothing is ever as it seems as the brilliant mind of Conan soon reveals.

episodes.name: No Immunity for the Diplomat (1)
episodes.overview: Conan, Richard and Rachel are joined by Harley Hartwell, a teen detective from the west coast, in solving the sealed room murder of a diplomat.

episodes.name: No Immunity for the Diplomat (2)
episodes.overview: Jimmy Kudo returns to the surprise of everyone, especially himself! As Jimmy tries to expose the real secret behind the perfectly sealed room, the rivalry between he and Harley Hartwell heats up!

episodes.name: The Book Without Pages
episodes.overview: A routine afternoon at the library turns into the hunt for a corpse after an attendant turns up missing. When Conan and the Detective Boys try to solve the mystery by staying after-hours, they find themselves trapped, in the dark, and not alone. Will they catch the killer before he catches them?

episodes.name: Driving a Bomb
episodes.overview: A relaxing day at the driving range leads Kogoro, Ran, and Conan to their next explosive case, as the president of a leading electronics manufacturer meets an untimely end. With many suspects and few clues, will Conan unravel the mystery in time to catch a killer?

episodes.name: The Mist Goblin Murder (1/2)
episodes.overview: A baffling and seemingly impossible murder is committed at a secluded Mount Takao temple. Luckily Conan and Kogoro are on the scene. It is believed that the terrible Mist Goblin (Kiritengu), a creature with super strength, haunts the temple. Conan doesn't believe in goblins, but he may have to change his tune as the evidence suggests that the Mist Goblin may be more than just a legend.

episodes.name: Weapon of Choice
episodes.overview: After finding a wounded bird on the ground Conan, Kogoro, and Ran hear a loud scream coming from the building next to them. Once upon entering the building they find a terrified woman in the hall, screaming about how she has just found her husband dead. The murder victim on the balcony, believed to have been killed by a plant pot.

episodes.name: Game Gone Bad
episodes.overview: Kogoro is invited to a party for the release of a game which stars himself. While there, Conan runs into a man who uses the alias Tequila and learns that he plans to meet with Gin and Vodka. Conan follows Tequila to the bathroom where an explosion occurs and kills the man. Conan investigates the explosion and realizes that it was a murder attempt but the wrong person was killed.

episodes.name: The Train Trick Murder Case
episodes.overview: As Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are on their way home from a hot spring in Komono, Mie Prefecture, they boarded a train together with a pair of doctors. They arrived at a station where one may change trains to another line, but no one could possibly change trains since the two lines are scheduled differently by a mere five-minute difference. At the station where the trio are to change trains to one going to Tokyo, a murder is discovered. The only suspect rides in the train with Conan's group while the victim rides on a train from a different line.

episodes.name: The Sunfish Murder
episodes.overview: Conan's on the case when the manager of a cleaning company is crushed by a piece of steel, but he encounters only dead ends in the alleyway where the murder was committed.

episodes.name: Footsteps of the Hero (1)
episodes.overview: Conan enters a Sherlock Holmes contest to win a rare first-edition book and persuades Ran Mouri and Kogoro to attend.

episodes.name: Footsteps of the Hero (2)
episodes.overview: Conan enters a Sherlock Holmes contest to win a rare first-edition book and persuades Ran Mouri and Kogoro to attend.

episodes.name: Shopping Can Be Murder
episodes.overview: The Detective Boys are back on the case when a young boy finds himself the unknowing target of a killer. Conan and his friends must use all their deductive powers to protect the tiny tot and bring a murderer to justice before he strikes again.

episodes.name: Illustrated Murder
episodes.overview: Kenjin Hanaoka is a popular painter who seems to have everything that a man could want: his own design firm, best selling books, and untold wealth. But when he decides to eat the forbidden fruit and have an affair with one of his pretty, young illustrators his life starts to come apart at the seams.

episodes.name: Ghost Ship Murder (1)
episodes.overview: Ran and Conan accompany Kogoro to Shiki Island, a very superstitious island, where many of the residents believe in local legends.

episodes.name: Ghost Ship Murder (2)
episodes.overview: Ran and Conan accompany Kogoro to Shiki Island, a very superstitious island, where many of the residents believe in local legends.

episodes.name: Gomera!
episodes.overview: Conan and the Detective Boys visit the film set of their favorite monster, Gomera, and stumble onto a real-life murder. The most puzzling aspect of the case is the prime suspect: Gomera. The kids must uncover the truth behind the grizzly killing before the death toll rises higher.

episodes.name: The Three Fingerprints
episodes.overview: Kogoro must choose between friendship and the law when an old friend is suspected of murder. It is up to Conan to find the clues and piece together the truth that will either condemn Kogoro's mentor, or set him free.

episodes.name: The Crab and Whale
episodes.overview: A relaxing night out turns into the search for a kidnapped little boy, as Kogoro Ran, and Conan come to the aide of a desperate father in his hour of need. As they search to find the truth, nothing is certain, except the kidnapper's deadly ultimatum: No police, no mercy, no time.

episodes.name: Moonless Murder
episodes.overview: How can blood from one victim, murdered on the street, wind up on the wall of an abandoned building, the railing of a rooftop, and broken glass of an upper apartment window? This is the question Conan must answer if he is to catch a crafty killer entrenched in a seemingly innocent mountain-climbing fraternity, which hides a deadly secret.

episodes.name: The Case of the Murdered Actress
episodes.overview: Kogoro is given a case to solve the sender of a threat note. His teacher Heihachiro Shiota appears at his house and decides to go to the theater, too. Conan and Ran tag along. Kogoro's case turns into a murder, but he soon breaks his backbone before Conan can solve it.

episodes.name: Knight Baron Mystery (1)
episodes.overview: Conan and the Mouris attend a mystery tour involving the Night Baron, a character from the books written by Shinichi's father, at a beach hotel.

episodes.name: Knight Baron Mystery (2)
episodes.overview: The tour takes a deadly turn when one of the guests falls from a room and is impaled on a statue.

episodes.name: Knight Baron Mystery (3)
episodes.overview: Conan closes in on the killer's identity when he realizes something he missed earlier. Meanwhile, Rachel suspects that an idol of her's, a karate champion staying at the hotel, is involved.

episodes.name: The Stalker
episodes.overview: Richard, Conan, and Rachel discover a corpse in the street. While the police believe the incident to be a random murder, the victim's past leads Conan to pin the blame on the most unassuming suspect of all!

episodes.name: Triple Terror
episodes.overview: Conan and Rachel find themselves embroiled in a murder at a private beach. However, even more disturbing than the brutal death is the list of prime suspects: the victim's triplet sons!

episodes.name: The Ship Wreck Murder
episodes.overview: An S.O.S. message in a bottle disrupts Conan's beachside vacation. Can he and his Junior Detective League friends find the young woman they believe to be the note's author?

episodes.name: Jinnai, King of Death
episodes.overview: When a killer claiming to be the King of Death sends a threat to movie star, Conan, Richard, and Rachel must stop the culprit from making good on his warning: At the stroke of Midnight, you will die!

episodes.name: Murder and Mahjong
episodes.overview: Mahjong: a game of strategy, skill, and luck - three things that a sinister murderer hopes he has on his side! Conan must stack the clues and place details in order if he is to win this terrifying game!

episodes.name: Phantom Thief 1412 (1/2)
episodes.overview: Conan enters a battle of wits with an elusive master thief known as Kaito Kid and has to stop him from stealing a precious pearl from Sonoko's family aboard a cruise ship.

episodes.name: Mysterious Masked Murder (1)
episodes.overview: When Richard is hired to find wealthy Gerard Dufour's childhood sweetheart, a murder takes place right under his nose - and the prime suspect turns up dead.

episodes.name: Mysterious Masked Murder (2)
episodes.overview: Conan and Harley Hartwell's covert investigation continues. But with precious few suspects, one big question haunts the brilliant duo: If Roland Dufour didn't commit the murder, then who did?

episodes.name: The Revengeful Robber
episodes.overview: Conan and Rachel become embroiled in a bank robbery that ends in murder. Just when Inspector Meguire thinks he's solved the crime, Conan discovers a hidden agenda that busts the case wide-open!

episodes.name: Dead Hobo
episodes.overview: When the Junior Detective League sets out to help an ailing homeless man, they end up involved in a new murder mystery. They know who did it - but can they get anyone to listen to them?

episodes.name: Two Times Trouble (1)
episodes.overview: Ran and Sonoko are getting ready to attend a huge concert by the very popular J-Pop band Two-Mix. Some hours before that, Conan and the Detective Boys go to a coffee parlor and meet a lady with sunglasses and a cap... who turns out to be the singer of the group, a woman named Minami Takayama whose voice is rather similar to Conan's.

episodes.name: Two Times Trouble (2)
episodes.overview: Ayumi, Mitsuhiko, and Genta tells Inspector Megure everything except how to find Conan. They decide to follow him and they learned who the kidnapper is and why the crime was committed.

episodes.name: The Set Up
episodes.overview: Richard witnesses a murder in the hospital, but his eyes may be playing tricks on him: he sees the same scene four nights in a row. Things get even stranger when he emerges as the prime suspect.

episodes.name: Massacre Night (1)
episodes.overview: Conan, Rachel and Serena get stranded at a ski lodge with an old teacher while someone is hiding in the dark and strangling the residents in the night

episodes.name: Massacre Night (2)
episodes.overview: After Serena was attacked, the words MASSACRE NIGHT were found written on her hand. Conan leaps into action to uncover the truth, but sometimes the truth is too much to handle.

episodes.name: Find the Kidnap Site
episodes.overview: The Junior Detective League is after a kidnapper who has dubious intentions. There's more than one life at stake if Conan can't figure out where the captive child is hidden.

episodes.name: For the Birds
episodes.overview: Conan and Rachel take Richard on a crane-watching trip, but the man responsible for the birds' well being is found murdered. The victim's son turns himself in, but Conan suspects the guy is innocent.

episodes.name: Vampire Villa (1)
episodes.overview: Richard is hired by a horror novelist to find out with whom his wife is having an affair. Later the same evening, the man is killed in a ritualistic manner and all of the house guests turn out to have motives.

episodes.name: Vampire Villa (2)
episodes.overview: Horror novelist Stefan Van Croven has been pierced through the chest with a wooden stake. Richard is convinced that the answer is right under his nose, but he doesn't know that Conan's figured out the trick.

episodes.name: Deadly Art
episodes.overview: Richard is asked to investigate a murder threat against Rika Okano, a respected artist who is up for an award. The threat is simple: If Rika receives the award, she will be murdered.

episodes.name: Hospital Homicide
episodes.overview: After Richard breaks his leg, Conan's stops by to visit and senses all is not right with Moore's hospital roommates. His suspicions are justified when a high stakes game of kidnapping and murder begins.

episodes.name: Mountain Fox (1)
episodes.overview: Richard, Rachel and Conan join a client who has hired an assassin known as "the Fox" to kill him to a hike in the mountain to stop the assassin, who turns out to be a member of the party when a guide is killed

episodes.name: Mountain Fox (2)
episodes.overview: Conan is faced with the task of tracking the Fox, the world's most notorious assassin, after the mysterious death of two campers. Can Conan stop him from killing again?

episodes.name: The Other Girl
episodes.overview: A wonderland of wintertime fun becomes a stage for tragedy following the death of an actress at the peak of her career. But a suicide note and a history of poor health don't always add up to the obvious.

episodes.name: Richard's Deadly Date
episodes.overview: Richard's set to reunite with a childhood friend, but what happens is more than Richard ever could have imagined. What do an old ink pen, a security camera, and three children add up to? Murder.

episodes.name: Jimmy Kudo Revealed (1-4)
episodes.overview: Rachel becomes suspicious of Conan when she notices that he looks a lot like Jimmy when he was his age. Meanwhile, Conan becomes involved in the investigations of the murders of a magician and a friend of his mother's.

episodes.name: The Farewell Wine Murder Case
episodes.overview: Richard is hired by a retiring billionaire to stop his daughters from killing him for the inheritance. When he is poisoned, Conan realizes that there is more to his death than meets the eye.

episodes.name: Potter's Gambit (1)
episodes.overview: While visiting a famous potter, Conan, Richard, and Rachel stumble upon what they believe to be a suicide - but was it? As the detectives soon learn, looks can often times be deceiving.

episodes.name: Potter's Gambit (2)
episodes.overview: Conan tries to unravel the mystery of Margery Taylor's apparent suicide, but how can he prove a murder took place when all of the suspects - including Richard, Rachel, and himself - share the same alibi?

episodes.name: The Memories of First Love (1)
episodes.overview: Rachel and Conan join Annette, one of Jimmy's old flames, on a weekend getaway. When the villa catches fire, Rachel risks her life to save her competition. Was the fire an accident? Or is something sinister afoot?

episodes.name: The Memories of First Love (2)
episodes.overview: Conan quickly figures out the complicated method the arsonist used to torch the house, as well as the motive behind it. But after the case is solved, Jimmy is in for an embarrassing surprise of his own.

episodes.name: Fame and Misfortune (1)
episodes.overview: A movie star hires Richard to advise him for a role as a detective. But the line between fact and fiction blurs when Richard, Rachel, and Conan discover they have front row seats to an act of murder.

episodes.name: Fame and Misfortune (2)
episodes.overview: As the media flocks to the high-profile murder case, the police prepare to charge a movie star with murder. Can Conan prove he knows who actually committed the crime?

episodes.name: The Mystery of Bludcraven Manor (1)
episodes.overview: When Conan and Rachel join Richard for a trip to Bludcraven Manor, they learn of a troubling secret that may link Morfius Bludcraven, the original lord of the estate, to a band of thieves known as The Goblins.

episodes.name: The Mystery of Bludcraven Manor (2)
episodes.overview: Conan, Richard, and Rachel attempt to decipher a secret code that promises to solve the strange mysteries of Bludcraven Manor. The unsuspecting sleuths have no clue that the goblins they hunt are very real.

episodes.name: Snapshots of Death
episodes.overview: When a photographer wins an award for capturing a fire on film, it seems like his career has been made - but when Richard accuses him of being a murderer on TV, one of their careers is about to go up in smoke.

episodes.name: The Mystery Moletian Case (1)
episodes.overview: A distraught man visits Richard about his murdered sister, but things just don't add up. A jewelry store heist and a car chase lead Conan back to the scene of the crime as another case unfolds.

episodes.name: The Mystery Moletian Case (2)
episodes.overview: A suspected murder, a jewel heist, and a missing body have Conan and the Junior Detective League working every angle to crack the case. Will Conan be able to put the clues together in time?

episodes.name: Hit and Run
episodes.overview: When a killer spies the Junior Detective League on TV, he decides to use them for his own evil purposes. Can Conan and his pals see through his plan or will they unwittingly help him get away with murder?

episodes.name: Recipe for Murder (1)
episodes.overview: When Rachel and Serena attend a cooking class and the teacher is stabbed in the back with a very thin weapon during a blackout, Conan realizes that the killer is one of her students and the weapon is hidden somewhere in the classroom.

episodes.name: Recipe for Murder (2)
episodes.overview: All four suspects had a reason to stab their cooking instructor in the back. But what was the murder weapon, where is it hidden, and how was the killer able to strike in a pitch-black kitchen?

episodes.name: School of Ghouls
episodes.overview: Intruders and disappearances lead to rumors that Teitan Elementary School is haunted. The Junior Detective League springs into action, and Conan senses that a few teachers are covering something up.

episodes.name: Prescription for Murder
episodes.overview: Rachel and Conan discover a woman's body, and the victim's best friend accuses the Medical Examiner of murder. The Doctor is definitely a heel, but is he really guilty of murder?

episodes.name: Scuba Dying (1)
episodes.overview: Conan and the gang befriend a group of university students at an ocean resort. When a banded sea snake attacks, a life hangs in the balance! Can Conan uncover the truth behind an attempted murder?

episodes.name: Scuba Dying (2)
episodes.overview: A young woman is barely clinging to life and every individual in the group of college students is a suspect. Can Conan make sense of it in time? Or will a murderer escape without a trace?

episodes.name: The Mystery Writer Disappearance (1)
episodes.overview: When a vanished mystery writer begins a new story series, his daughter seeks help from Kogoro to track him down. Conan realizes that time is running out when he finds hidden messages in his new texts.

episodes.name: The Mystery Writer Disappearance (2)
episodes.overview: The codes hidden within the novel are more complex than Conan originally thought. But how can he lead the investigators toward answers without his voice-emulating tie?

episodes.name: License to Die (1/2)
episodes.overview: While visiting Harley's hometown on the west coast, Conan joins him in investigating a mysterious serial killer case.

episodes.name: The Masked Yaiba Murder Mystery
episodes.overview: Reality and fantasy collide! After the Junior Detective League meets a member of the Laser Police - and Masked Yaiba - a murder takes place right before their eyes!

episodes.name: The Big Sting
episodes.overview: Richard is invited to a mountain retreat by a former client, but his hopes of romance end when she jumps off of a balcony to her death. Did she commit suicide or was it murder?

episodes.name: The Forgotten Bond (1)
episodes.overview: Richard loses his Yoko concert ticket and finds Maya instead. The detective discovers the two share some common interests: music, Yoko Okino, and murder!

episodes.name: The Forgotten Bond (2)
episodes.overview: A blood stain leads Conan to revisit one of the most disturbing murder mysteries of his career. Unless he can get through to Meguire, a killer could walk free!

episodes.name: The Disappearing Weather Girl
episodes.overview: A popular anchorwoman disappears and the Junior Detective League is called into action! Coded messages, symbols, and wild weather send the gang on a frenzied game of cat and mouse!

episodes.name: A Mysterious Sniper Murder Case (1)
episodes.overview: Kogoro is hired by a company president to act as his bodyguard because of threats he's gotten. At a banquet, a politician is shot and killed by a sniper while Kogoro's client is grazed by the bullet.

episodes.name: A Mysterious Sniper Murder Case (2)
episodes.overview: Seiji Ishimoto tells the police about the threat letters after he's approached by the minister's secretary, Tsuneaki Niikura. When everyone leaves the hotel room, Conan searches for clues.

episodes.name: The Traveling Drama Troupe Murder Case (1)
episodes.overview: Rachel, Serena, and the Junior Detective League are given backstage access by Tamanosuke Ito to his drama/acrobatics show that specializes in plays depicting “Edo Boy”, a feudal-themed thief responsible for crimes across Japan who has evaded arrest to the present day.

episodes.name: The Traveling Drama Troupe Murder Case (2)
episodes.overview: Tamanosuke is seen wandering around Tetsuo’s murder scene and is found attacked by Conan and Megumi.

episodes.name: The Black Organization: 1 Billion Yen Robbery Case
episodes.overview: While at the bank, Conan witnesses bank robbers driving away with the 1 billion yen in a truck.

episodes.name: The Girl from the Black Organization and the University Professor Murder Case
episodes.overview: Conan's class receives a new student named Ai Haibara.

episodes.name: The Indiscriminate Threatening Stadium Case (1)
episodes.overview: The Junior Detective League are at attending a soccer stadium match when Conan notices someone shot a ball with a handgun. The police arrive and Conan learns that a culprit called the TV director demanding a ransom or else he will begin shooting at people from inside the crowd.

episodes.name: The Indiscriminate Threatening Stadium Case (2)
episodes.overview: The caller demands 1¥ billion in exchange for calling the police. Conan, knowing that it is impossible to gather that amount of money in a short time, concludes the caller plans to murder someone regardless of the money.

episodes.name: Magic Lover's Murder Case (The Murder)
episodes.overview: Serena invites Rachel, to attend a meeting full of avid magic fans she met online.

episodes.name: Magic Lover's Murder Case (The Suspicion)
episodes.overview: The members of the lounge decide to leave the Hamano's body untouched to preserve the crime scene and retreat back into the lounge.

episodes.name: Magic Lover's Murder Case (The Resolution)
episodes.overview: Conan recreates the crossbow attack on the top floor and lures everyone outside. Using a tranquilizer, Conan knocks Serena out and reveals the culprit.

episodes.name: The Disappearing Weapon Case
episodes.overview: The Detective Boys accompany Ayumi Yoshida to Mitsue Mika, her barber, for a haircut. They discover that Mika died after being strangled by an unknown culprit.

episodes.name: The Old Blue Castle Investigation Case (1)
episodes.overview: The Detective Boys are on a camping trip but Dr. Agasa forgot the tent. They wander to a castle owned by Masuyo Mamiya, meet Katsuo Tabata, Mitsuru Mamiya, Takahito Mamiya, and learn that there's a secret treasure somewhere inside.

episodes.name: The Old Blue Castle Investigation Case (2)
episodes.overview: Haibara leads the investigation and is accompanied by the Detective Boys.

episodes.name: The Final Screening Murder Case (1)
episodes.overview: The Detective Boys, accompanied with Dr. Agasa, attend the final opening day of a theater as it is about to be demolished. They meet the theater owner, Akio Muramatsu, and his employees Minoru Furuhashi and Yuriko Tomosato. Seiji Haruta, a sadistic real estate agent, arrives and announces his plan to tear the theater down to make way for new business.

episodes.name: The Final Screening Murder Case (2)
episodes.overview: After gaining sufficient evidence and reviewing Toshiyuki's video, Conan uses Dr. Agasa's voice to shed light on the matter at hand and reveals the killer.

episodes.name: SOS! Message from Amy!
episodes.overview: There is a burglar on the loose! But Ayumi is sick so she stays home. When a burglar invades her house, she tries using the detective badge to call for help.

episodes.name: The Night Before the Wedding Locked Room Case (1)
episodes.overview: Heiji and Kazuha visit Tokyo accompanied by Kogoro, Ran, and Conan. They run into Heiji's father's friend and are invited to their mansion. There a murder occurs and his father's friend is found dead in a locked room.

episodes.name: The Night Before the Wedding Locked Room Case (2)
episodes.overview: Continuing the investigation, Heiji proclaims the butler was the murderer and he is taken away, screaming his innocence.

episodes.name: The Suspicious Astronomical Observation
episodes.overview: Ran, Serena, and Conan go to watch the stars. Serena is especially hoping that she will see a shooting star. Ran has a friend at the observatory that helps her use a telescope; he introduces his senpais that work at the observatory. One of them just won an award known as the "Star Pioneer". However, that same night, that same person falls from the higher level of the observatory. Conan knows that this isn't an accident - but how can he prove it?

episodes.name: The North Star No. 3 Express Leaving Ueno (1)
episodes.overview: Conan, Kogoro, and Ran take the overnight North Star Express to Hokkaido to meet a former client. Conan notices that the events is eerily similar to the plot of an unpublished novel written by his father, Yusaku, that had been stolen ten years prior.

episodes.name: The North Star No. 3 Express Leaving Ueno (2)
episodes.overview: Conan reveals the suspicious woman to be his mother, Yukiko Kudo. When Kogoro calls all the passengers to witness his inaccurate deduction, Conan figures out the trick.

episodes.name: Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story (1)
episodes.overview: The Detective Boys go to the police station trying to figure out who robbed a nearby bank.

episodes.name: Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story (2)
episodes.overview: Conan continues his investigation, closing in on Keizo, his prime suspect in the stabbing death of his wife, Kayo. With all pieces of the crime in place, Conan understands the hidden truth and drops hints for the officers.

episodes.name: The Sudden Street Car Stopping Case
episodes.overview: Conan and the Detective Boys wake up at 5:30 in the morning to go get in line for a roller coaster ride. There are only three other people on the train, all of them are trainspotters. One of the photographers waits outside so he can take pictures of the train coming towards him; suddenly, the ladder underneath him tips over and he falls onto the track. The train conductor quickly applies the emergency brakes, and everybody rushes out of the train to find him unhurt. However, when Conan comes back into the train to continue their journey, they find one of the other photographers dead. How can Conan make the officer in charge of the case see sense that this was a murder, not an accident?

episodes.name: The Amusement Park Bungee Jumping Case
episodes.overview: At an amusement park, an accident occurs during a Kamen Yaiba playing. As Yaiba jumped from a bungee cord, the cord burns and he falls into the water. 20 minutes later, he is found dead.

episodes.name: The Truth of the Exploding Car Case (1)
episodes.overview: Kogoro reveals that he tutored in his youth, and resolves to meet up with one of his students. However, when they go see her, her car suddenly explodes as her sister drives it out of the driveway. Kogoro is determined to solve the case and find the murderer as soon as possible.

episodes.name: The Truth of the Exploding Car Case (2)
episodes.overview: With some prodding by Conan, Kogoro surprisingly finds the truth of the case himself. He confronts the criminal, and with some help from Conan, he overcomes his ideals and gets to the heart of the matter.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Old Man Disappearance Case
episodes.overview: While on the bus home, Ran meets an old man who later disappears.

episodes.name: Sonoko's Dangerous Summer Story (1)
episodes.overview: In an attempt to find a man and fix her love life, Sonoko goes to the beach with Ran and Conan

episodes.name: Sonoko's Dangerous Summer Story (2)
episodes.overview: After talking with Tadahiko, Sonoko falls asleep in the car, and someone puts it in drive.

episodes.name: The Key in the Water Locked Room Case
episodes.overview: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan pay a visit to an old woman. She decides to take them to her grandson, but he's found dead when they get into the house. The bathroom door is locked however. How could this have happened?

episodes.name: Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story 2 (1)
episodes.overview: Detective Sato is chasing a murderer through the school building where Conan, Haibara, Ayumi, Mitsuhiko, and Genta happen to be in.

episodes.name: Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story 2 (2)
episodes.overview: With the help of Conan, Haibara, Ayumi, Mitsuhiko, and Genta, the case is solved.

episodes.name: The Silent Ring Line
episodes.overview: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are waiting for the train when they notice a group of people leaving work on a Sunday. Once they boarded the train the group finds their co-worker dead in an empty train car.

episodes.name: The Bizarre Legend of the Five Storied Pagoda (1)
episodes.overview: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are visitors at the 5 story pagoda. After running into the manager, they are invited out to dinner as guest of the temple on him, thanks to the Great Kogoro. The morning after hearing the legend of 5 story pagoda, the manager (who was planning on turning it into a tourist attraction) turns up dead, hanging from the top floor, in a fashion mimicking the legend.

episodes.name: The Bizarre Legend of the Five Storied Pagoda (2)
episodes.overview: More evidence presents itself as Conan notices there are burn marks on the rope used to hang him, and also a slip knot tied. In addition, there was not enough length in the rope meaning, he would have needed to jump into the noose to commit suicide. Right before the police detective was going to call it a suicide case, Conan stuns Kogoro and reveals the method in which the murder was committed, followed by the key piece of evidence to prove who the murderer was.

episodes.name: The Murder Floating in Ryusuitei
episodes.overview: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are at a fancy traditional Japanese restaurant where food is delivered on a small computer controlled boat that navigates over a running stream around the restaurant. Later, a murder occurs and Conan realizes the only way it could have been possible was for a person to be alone, and to use the stream to access the room.

episodes.name: The Sealed Chamber in the Sky! Jimmy Kudo's First Case
episodes.overview: Agasa wins a trip to a beach resort and gives the tickets to Kogoro, Ran, and the Detective Boys. On the plane, Ran falls asleep and dreams about a murder that occurred on an Airliner.

episodes.name: The Secret of the Moon, the Star, and the Sun (1)
episodes.overview: Agasa takes the Detective Boys to his uncles house which has been abandoned fifty years ago for a treasure hunt he had set up.

episodes.name: The Secret of the Moon, the Star, and the Sun (2)
episodes.overview: Conan matches the symbols to the Hiragana table and reveals that the symbols in the objects direct to other objects in the room.

episodes.name: The Disappearing Junior Detective League Case
episodes.overview: The Detective Boys are in a puppeteer camping trip, where they are practicing for a school puppet play. At the same time, a serial killer has been spotted near the areas of the camp. While at the camp, the students disappear with their puppets, leaving the Detective Boys alone.

episodes.name: Tottori Spider Mansion Demon (The Murder)
episodes.overview: Hattori Heiji, bringing along Kazuha, is hired by the rich Takeda family to investigate a series of suspicious suicides that has plagued their mansion in Tottori Prefecture.

episodes.name: Tottori Spider Mansion Demon (The Suspicion)
episodes.overview: Conan and Heiji investigate further into the ghastly death of Nobukazu as well as the suicides of Misa, Kinuyo, and Negishi.

episodes.name: Tottori Spider Mansion Demon (The Resolution)
episodes.overview: Conan tranquilizes Kogoro and cooperates with Heiji to shed light on the case.

episodes.name: Venus' Kiss
episodes.overview: Kogoro is invited to an aquarium where an underwater play is to take place, A woman's dead body rises from the water when it's her cue to come out of a clam's shell in the play.

episodes.name: The Blind Spot in the Darkness (1)
episodes.overview: Conan detects a change in Ran’s behavior and speculates that she may have something going on. Kogoro, on the other hand, takes them to his doctor Yoshiteru Araide’s house for a checkup.

episodes.name: The Blind Spot in the Darkness (2)
episodes.overview: Conan establishes that Yoshiteru was murdered and finds several clues missed by the police including a broken piece of a vase.

episodes.name: The Revival of the Dying Message (1)
episodes.overview: Ran, Sonoko, and Conan are at the Tropical Land ice rink where they meet a group of people: Yasuharu Misawa, Izumi Sano, Yoriko Komatsu, Chihiro Itami, and Kunitomo Oda. Chihiro goes to the women's bathroom where she is being followed by a cloaked figure.

episodes.name: The Revival of the Dying Message (2)
episodes.overview: Bloody marks are discovered at and near the crime scene. Conan puts Kogoro to sleep to reveal that the culprit.

episodes.name: The 20 Year Old Murder Case: The Symphony Serial Murders
episodes.overview: Saizo Kano, known as the Organizer of Shadows, is shot to death by his subordinates, Sadao Kujirai, Korehisa Kanie, and Teruyoshi Kameda. In the present day, while celebrating their last heist on a luxury cruise ship, Kano’s crew is picked off one by one by a mysterious killer. The stakes are raised when Heiji is thrown into the Pacific Ocean while investigating and a bomb is discovered to be hidden on the ship. Is there something more sinister afloat, or has Kano returned from the dead to enact his vengeance 20 years later?

episodes.name: The Man Who Was Killed Four Times
episodes.overview: Richard is called to investigate a suspicious murder where three people admit to killing a man for hitting him on the head.

episodes.name: Meeting with the Black Organization Again (Haibara)
episodes.overview: On the way home from school, Conan and Haibara find Gin's Porsche 356 on the street and places a covert listening device in it. Conan hears that a Black Organization member codenamed Pisco is ordered to assassinate someone at a party hosted at Haido Hotel.

episodes.name: Meeting with the Black Organization Again (Conan)
episodes.overview: Conan investigates and reveals to Haibara that the purple handkerchief will narrow down the suspects.

episodes.name: Meeting with the Black Organization Again (Resolution)
episodes.overview: Haibara climbs to the top of the chimney only to be confronted by Gin and Vodka.

episodes.name: The Coffee Shop Truck's Wild Entrance Case
episodes.overview: Conan and the group go to a coffee shop. Nearby, two men are having a meeting. One of them gets up to go to the bathroom, and while he's gone, a truck slams into the coffee shop and smashes the other man who was still seated. Conan realizes it was a planned murder and finds evidence through the truck.

episodes.name: The Nocturne of Red Murderous Intent (1)
episodes.overview: Kogoro is invited by Yoshinori Kana to his home to investigate an unknown stalker harassing his wife, Misaki, who leaves mysterious gifts and letters.

episodes.name: The Nocturne of Red Murderous Intent (2)
episodes.overview: The case is solved, the mysterious man was figured out to be a statue hanged by a fishing rod.

episodes.name: The Big Investigation of the Nine Doors
episodes.overview: The Detective Boys are walking home one day when they discover two s shaped hooks and a ring with the initials M to A, a wedding ring. They decide to investigate seeing it as an S.O.S.

episodes.name: A Dangerous Recipe
episodes.overview: One day, The Detective Boys were bored so they picked up receipts in a convenience store to guess what the people are buying for dinner. George picks up a weird receipt with food items, a dust bin, a container, a handler light, rechargeable batteries, thin lytax gloves, and chlorine.

episodes.name: A Cursed Mask Coldly Laughs
episodes.overview: Kogorou, Ran, and Conan are invited by the hostess of a car accident charity named Shou Beniko. While driving, they find a message from the Phantom of the Cursed Masks who tells them they should not go.

episodes.name: The Murdered Famous Detective (1)
episodes.overview: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are driving by when an arrow almost hits Kogoro. Afterwards, they stay at a hotel when an actor is found dead with a bullet in his head and all the evidence suggests it is the work of an outsider.

episodes.name: The Murdered Famous Detective (2)
episodes.overview: Conan later solves the case by showing how the culprit tried to place false evidence to lure the police to think it was an outsider.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Gun Rings in the Dark
episodes.overview: Kogoro is invited to a house as to impress the client's mother who is a finance trader, simply a loaner. Later, loaner is murdered and with the clues, the suspects are her son, daughter, or maid.

episodes.name: The Desperate Revival ~The Cavern of the Detective Boys~
episodes.overview: Ran's strange behavior causes Conan to suspect that she knows his identity as Jimmy. Later on, the Detective Boys are taken by Agasa on a camping trip.

episodes.name: The Desperate Revival ~The Wounded Great Detective~
episodes.overview: The Detective Boys realize that the riddle is a reference to shogi and that the dragon refers to a promoted rook. They take the direction a rook is placed on the shogi board and escape the cave.

episodes.name: The Desperate Revival ~The Third Choice~
episodes.overview: Vi reveals the gun was a fake and reminds Conan the threat that the Black Organization poses.

episodes.name: The Desperate Revival ~The Black Knight~
episodes.overview: The police are unable to find the source of the poison from the drinks. As they are able to rule the death as a suicide, the black knight declares it was a murder and reveals his identity.

episodes.name: The Desperate Revival ~Jimmy's Return...~
episodes.overview: Shinichi takes Ran to a fancy restaurant in order to confess his love.

episodes.name: The Desperate Revival ~The Promised Place~
episodes.overview: After checking the company's mascot, Shinichi confirms Satoru to be the murderer, thus locking the two in a game of cat and mouse.

episodes.name: The Significant Music Box (1)
episodes.overview: A girl named Yuuki Haruna asks Kogoro Mouri to search for a man named Shuugo whom she texts with on her pager.

episodes.name: The Significant Music Box (2)
episodes.overview: Conan investigates and realizes how the pranks were done and who is attempting to scare Haruna away.

episodes.name: The Invisible Weapon, Rachel's First Investigation
episodes.overview: Ran and Sonoko are on their way to a restaurant when Chie Yoshino allegedly falls asleep in her car but nearly misses them at the last moment. They soon meet Akio, Chie’s husband, but Ran finds his actions suspicious.

episodes.name: The Super Car's Trap (1)
episodes.overview: Kogoro wins the city lottery for first place and the reward was an all-expense paid vacation in a hotel and Conan and Ran tag along. In the hotel, a car exhibition is about to do its grand opening.

episodes.name: The Super Car's Trap (2)
episodes.overview: After investigating, Conan reveals that a cover was used to direct the fume into the car. He reveals who the culprit is.

episodes.name: Kogoro Mouri, Suspect (1)
episodes.overview: Kogoro is relaxing at a luxury hotel. After dinner, a drunken Kogoro goes missing, prompting the others to search for him. Eri calls his phone, hears it ringing from the inside of Ritsuko’s room, open the door with the chain lock in place, and find Ritsuko strangled to death. Worst of all, Kogoro emerges from the bed, much to everyone’s shock.

episodes.name: Kogoro Mouri, Suspect (2)
episodes.overview: Eri continues to pretend Kogoro is the killer but only to fool real guilty party.

episodes.name: The Tenth Passenger (1)
episodes.overview: Conan, Ran, and Kogoro are riding a bonnet bus, driven by bus operator Mamoru Kajita and guided by Touko Natsume, through the mountains. On the bus already is the president of the Kagekura youth club, Takurou Yabe. The bus stops to pick up other travelers including Souchiki Okumura, who forces Kogoro out of his seat. He argues with Yabe then drinks from his water bottle and collapses dead from poison.

episodes.name: The Tenth Passenger (2)
episodes.overview: Ran reveals that the person who ran past her after Funaki was killed was Yabe. Kogoro catches him but Yabe maintains his innocence.

episodes.name: The Black Wing of Icarus (1)
episodes.overview: Mouri, Ran, and Conan are staying at a hotel where they meet the twins from the case of the cursed mask. Later, an actress comes and causes trouble. The next day, she is found hanged in her room.

episodes.name: The Black Wing of Icarus (2)
episodes.overview: Conan notices that this is not a suicide but a murder. He later proves that the culprit hang-glided to the hotel and went back by stowing in the trunk of a car.

episodes.name: Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story 3 (1)
episodes.overview: A serial arsonist sets huge fires across the city and Takagi and Miwako with the Detective Boys are out to solve it.

episodes.name: Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story 3 (2)
episodes.overview: After Ai reveals the pattern of the arsonist attack, Ayumi, Genta, and Mitsuhiko run into the arsonist who attempts to kill them.

episodes.name: The Deduction That Was Too Good
episodes.overview: Kogoro is carried by Ran and accompanied by Conan one night picking him up from a bar. While walking they witness a fight in an apartment. The next day a murder occurs. One of the man who's heard arguing comes to Moore for help to prove his innocence. The man has made good suggestions on where to find evidence which are in fact too good.

episodes.name: The Entrance to the Maze: The Anger of Colossus
episodes.overview: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are invited for a ceremony for a ropeway which is built through a giant Goddess Statue on the mountains by Doumouto Guze. They learn that there is a rumour about a curse by the goddess' anger and Kogoro was invited to disprove it. After riding through the ropeway on the opening day, Doumouto, who has disappeared from the ropeway cart, is later found dead on the goddess' hand.

episodes.name: The Falling from Mt. Ryushin Case
episodes.overview: The Detective Boys excluding Ai, are traveling through a winding path on Mt Ryushin. There they witness a derailed car fall off the mountain. The man has died and through the evidence, Conan concludes another car rammed into that car.

episodes.name: The Water Palace of 5 Colors (1)
episodes.overview: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan came as the substitutes for Serena and her father, the Suzuki president, and decided to attend a tea meeting at the Aonogi house. At the backyard of the mansion, there was a pond that shined in five colors. And there was a bridge which led to the tea room. While they were enjoying the pond’s colors something unusual happened… The headmaster died in the tea room, the same way as the legend.

episodes.name: The Water Palace of 5 Colors (2)
episodes.overview: Conan searches for clues to who murdered the Headmaster busily and finally figures out the trick that was used.

episodes.name: Mushrooms, Bears, and the Detective Boys (1)
episodes.overview: The Detective Boys decided to go mushroom picking in the mountains. And during it, Genta got lost in the hunting area.

episodes.name: Mushrooms, Bears, and the Detective Boys (2)
episodes.overview: Ai deduces that if they reveal themselves, the hunter trying to get rid of them will shoot them and say that he thought they were bears. So Ai and Mitsuhiko leave a clue for Conan in the form of different types of mushrooms that tells him who the killer is.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Retro Room Case
episodes.overview: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are attending a dolphin show when a murder occurs in the hotel.

episodes.name: The Bay of Revenge (1)
episodes.overview: While Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are driving near the ocean, their car breaks down, prompting them to ask for help at a house which belongs to famous lawyer Kensuke Tachibana. There, they meet secretary Yuuichi Sakuraba, his caretaker Yaeko Kamei, his wife Yuki Tachibana, his office's accountant Noriko Sugimura, and lawyer Fumio Fujisawa. As the day progresses, Kensuke explains to Kogoro that he’s been receiving threatening letters from someone with the initials “T.K.”

episodes.name: The Bay of Revenge (2)
episodes.overview: Conan believes that Kumada was met with foul play. Conan puts Kogoro to sleep, deducing that the killer drugged Kensuke while he was out with Kumada.

episodes.name: Megure's Locked Away Secret (1)
episodes.overview: The police inform Kogoro about a serial offender attacking women wearing ganguro makeup. According to the victims’ testimony, their attacker stood at 150 centimeters tall. Kogoro mentions a similar case 20 years ago where female high school students were run over, shocking Megure.

episodes.name: Megure's Locked Away Secret (2)
episodes.overview: Megure reveals a case in the past which is why he was so anxious.

episodes.name: Gathered Great Detectives! Jimmy Kudo vs. Phantom Thief Kid
episodes.overview: The Phantom Thief Kid stands on top of a building with his butler. He discusses the time he was almost caught by a famous Detective in the East, Shinichi Kudo. He plans to "steal" the clock tower. Although, he leaves it standing with a code upon its hands, saying "I will not give this clock to anyone".

episodes.name: The Client Full of Lies (1)
episodes.overview: Conan becomes suspicious of Kogoro's latest client, a woman looking for an old lover, even more so when a murdered man is found clutching a photo of her.

episodes.name: The Client Full of Lies (2)
episodes.overview: After a thorough investigation, Conan tranquilizes Kogoro and reveals the culprit.

episodes.name: And There Were No Mermaids (The Murder)
episodes.overview: Conan, along with Heiji, Ran, and Kazuha travel the Isle of Mermaids looking for Saori Kadowaki, who had sent a letter to Heiji asking him to save her from being killed by a mermaid.

episodes.name: And There Were No Mermaids (The Deduction)
episodes.overview: Conan and Heiji investigate Naoko's brutal murder and discover a trail of fish scales that suggest Naoko's killer came from the sea.

episodes.name: And There Were No Mermaids (The Resolution)
episodes.overview: With Kogoro stunned, Conan clears the suspects who were accused of murder, then explains that each victim was called out by the person they trusted and was lured with the promise of a personal gain before being murdered, and reveals the killer.

episodes.name: The Secret of the High Sales
episodes.overview: A boy named Rintaro asks the Detective Boys to investigate on a strange man named Yuuji Kamekura. Rintaro explains that Yuuji appeared one day at his family restaurant claiming he owes Rintaro's grandfather a favor and would like to work at the restaurant. Yuuji soon after begins living with the family and helps them improve the restaurant to the point the family are constantly busy with the customers.

episodes.name: The Battle Game Trap (1)
episodes.overview: Sonoko, Ran, and Conan are at the arcade where they meet their high school English teacher, Jodie Starling who is an avid gamer. Jodie introduces Ran to a virtual reality fighting game which uses mechanics to simulate the pain of a real fight. Ran loses to a gamer named Kengo Bitou who taunts her in her lost. Bitou plays the game again his rival, Takayasu Shimizu; The battle is projected on a large screen. Bitou's avatar overwhelms Shimizu's but stops at the climax of the match. The people in the arcade realize Bitou is dead and the police are called in.

episodes.name: The Battle Game Trap (2)
episodes.overview: Conan investigates and learns the method and the culprit who murdered Bitou.

episodes.name: The Murderous Pottery Class (1)
episodes.overview: Ran, Sonoko, and Conan attend Muneyuki Mino's pottery class to make pretty mugs. Muneyuki is pleased to see Ran as her father Kogoro solved a murder case at The Forgemaster's estate. Later on, Muneyuki displays a dark personality.

episodes.name: The Murderous Pottery Class (2)
episodes.overview: Conan finds something suspicious about the pendant on the necktie and figures out Muneyuki and his methods.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Passenger (1)
episodes.overview: Conan and the Detective Boys are taking the transit bus to a ski resort where they meet Araide and Jodie aboard the bus. Soon after, the bus is hijacked by two armed men who uses the passengers as hostages and demands the city to release their boss.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Passenger (2)
episodes.overview: Conan figures out who the accomplice is. The Detective Boys are able to inform the driver to stop suddenly which allows Conan to apprehend the criminals.

episodes.name: The Apartment Degradation Case
episodes.overview: Mouri Kogoro accepts a case to help to find out who has been sending threatening phone calls and letters to a man named Mitsuo Yoshimura. On the way to Yoshimura's apartment with his friend Joji Ueda, Kogoro and Conan witness Yoshimura fall to his death.

episodes.name: The Evidence That Didn't Disappear (1)
episodes.overview: Agasa takes the Detective Boys to a neighbor named Teruya Kanou who is giving away his belongings before moving to England. While there Kanou's Papillon goes missing when the longcase clock strikes twelve and chimes twelve times.

episodes.name: The Evidence That Didn't Disappear (2)
episodes.overview: Conan notices that there is glass wool, which muffles sound, in the incinerator and realizes who the culprit is.

episodes.name: The Locked Wine Cellar
episodes.overview: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are invited to a private party by a President of a financial business, who is known for his expensive collection and various tastes in wine.

episodes.name: The Nanki Beach Mystery Tour (1)
episodes.overview: Ran, Kogoro, and Conan go to Shirahama on a vacation they won from a shopping district lottery, and there meet a group of college students named Maki Shinjou, Tatsuhiko Yura, Madoka Mitsui, Kanako Miyahara, and Kouta Fuji. They are all in the same art club, but don't seem to get along well.

episodes.name: The Nanki Beach Mystery Tour (2)
episodes.overview: Conan investigates and finds out that Madoka was cheating on her boyfriend with another student, Fuji, but that none of them committed the murder.

episodes.name: The 3 "K"s of Osaka Case (1)
episodes.overview: Heiji invites Kogoro, Ran, and Conan to a celebration of the opening of the 3K restaurant by three American celebrities, a heavyweight boxing champion named Ricardo Barreira, a Major League Baseball player named Mike Norwood, and the pro soccer player known named Ray Curtis who Conan admires.

episodes.name: The 3 "K"s of Osaka Case (2)
episodes.overview: As Heiji is investigating the rooms, Conan suddenly appears and talks to him about that all three sport celebrities are all innocent.

episodes.name: The Bullet Train Transport Case (1)
episodes.overview: While traveling home on the Shinkansen from Osaka, Conan, Ran and Kogoro ran into Officer Satou and Takagi, who were transporting a criminal. Later, a bomb was found on the train that Officer Satou went to investigate.

episodes.name: The Bullet Train Transport Case (2)
episodes.overview: From the crime scene, Conan found a suspicious thing that makes the scene as the place of homicide. During the investigation, Conan observes three suspects. Conan points out the suspects of who the murderer is. After investigating and finding clues, Conan reveals the culprit.

episodes.name: Boy George's Misfortune
episodes.overview: Genta has been acting weird at school lately. The Detective Boys learns that he is being targeted by a killer. Genta tries to remember where he sees the killer.

episodes.name: Richard Moore's Imposter (1)
episodes.overview: Tatsuo Mori, a Mori Kogoro impersonator, arrives at the Aoiya Hotel near a creepy forest where he is invited to investigate a case where a long-haired man is said to have committed suicide 4-5 years ago.

episodes.name: Richard Moore's Imposter (2)
episodes.overview: After analyzing the clues and facts, Conan is convinced that the long-haired man and Tatsuo were murdered.

episodes.name: The Gun Shot in the Sunflower Building
episodes.overview: Conan, Kogoro and Ran all go to an isolated mansion called the Sunflower building because every 12 hours it rotates. They are having a BBQ outside while the owner is inside when they hear a shot fired. They rush inside to find the owner shot through the forehead.

episodes.name: The Mystery in the Net (1)
episodes.overview: Professor Agasa takes the Detective Boys and Conan at the beach during school break while Ran and Sonoko also happen to be on the exact beach. At night, all of them ate dinner in a hotel together with the lifeguards they met that morning. The man the lifeguards were supposed to meet didn't show up so they tried calling him but the only sound that could be heard was the sound of the waves.

episodes.name: The Mystery in the Net (2)
episodes.overview: Conan figures out the culprit and decides to use Professor Agasa's voice to reveal the trick but remembers he forgot his voice changing bow tie at the hotel.

episodes.name: The Alibi of the Soothing Forest
episodes.overview: While Conan, Ran and Kogoro are going sightseeing, the village head is killed by the somebody who visited the village head before post office lady.

episodes.name: The Idol Stars' Secret (1)
episodes.overview: Ran and Kogoro get an invitation for an engagement party from his favorite idol Youko-chan. Kaoru the one who is getting engaged is another star and a former member of a group they all used to be in. She is a fan of Kogoro and wanted him to find out who was stalking her.

episodes.name: The Idol Stars' Secret (2)
episodes.overview: Megure searches everyone for the murder weapon but it isn't found. Though they discover a listening device and find drawers tampered with.

episodes.name: The Tragedy at the OK Corral
episodes.overview: Because of Kogoro's love of horses he takes Conan and Ran to an OK corral ranch. One of their prize winning horses gets spooked and they all go running after her. They reach the horse and Conan finds blood on her horseshoe. They then find the farrier; one who shoes the horses, murdered.

episodes.name: The Kidnapper in the Picture
episodes.overview: Conan and the Detective Boys find out about a kidnapping case and decide to investigate.

episodes.name: Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story 4 (1)
episodes.overview: Satou is having an arranged marriage meeting with a man due to her mother's persistence. She arrives to find out it's Ninzaburo Shiratori. She proposes that if Takagi does not arrive to her before sunset, she will marry him whether she wants to or not. He accepts, but Takagi is busy with a store robbery.

episodes.name: Metropolitan Police Detective Love Story 4 (2)
episodes.overview: Takagi solves the case and arrests the culprit when he tries to make a dash out of the police car. Takagi catches up and gives up on going to Simone in time to stop the marriage as the sun is almost set and the car is too far away.

episodes.name: The 14th Round of the Matsue Tamatsukuri Linked Verse Contest (1)
episodes.overview: Kogoro wins a trip to Matsue from a lottery drawing, and while there they meet and join up with a Linked Verse group, which is a type of poetry. One of their members, a loan dealer, is killed, and Conan finds out that almost everyone has a motive to kill.

episodes.name: The 14th Round of the Matsue Tamatsukuri Linked Verse Contest (2)
episodes.overview: Conan hasn't figured out who the culprit is, so he gets Kogoro to participate in their Linked Verse Contest so he can have more time to observe the suspects.

episodes.name: The Extremely Strange Punishment from Heaven
episodes.overview: Conan and the Detective Boys are out walking around the town the morning after an earthquake when they hear a scream. They see a woman cradling a man bleeding, and they call an ambulance and the man is saved. He says he was robbed and 200,000 yen ($2,000) was stolen from. They have a suspect, but he has an alibi of committing another crime when the man was attacked.

episodes.name: The Man from Chicago (1)
episodes.overview: The Detective Boys attend an animal show involving a white lion named Leon. Outside, a man named James Black, is mistaken by reporters for Randy Hawks, a rich man who sponsors zoos and animal shows. The Detective Boys lead him out of the crowd of reporters by pretending he is their English Teacher. As return for their help, Black offers to treat them for lunch and leaves to get his car, only to be mistaken for Hawks and kidnapped for ransom

episodes.name: The Man from Chicago (2)
episodes.overview: Ayumi notices that Black still has her Detective Badge, allowing Conan to trace the signal and have Sato set up a road block intercepting the vehicle.

episodes.name: The Shaking Restaurant
episodes.overview: Conan, Kogoro, and Ran go to a restaurant that is shaking because of construction next door. They go back the next day only to find that the man running the restaurant is dead. At first it looks like the construction made a vase fall over and hit him on the head, killing the owner, however, the construction wasn't happening at the estimated time of death.

episodes.name: The Fearful Legend of the Snowy Night (1)
episodes.overview: Conan, Kogoro, and Ran are driving to a hot spring when the road gets closed due to snow, and so they accept an offer of staying the night at a nearby house. The next day they discover the body of the company president dead and when they follow the footprints, they find his eldest son dressed up in armor and also dead in a locked room.

episodes.name: The Fearful Legend of the Snowy Night (2)
episodes.overview: During the informal investigation, Conan discovers that the footprints of the armor in the snow were used to cover up the culprit's footprints, and finds that the locked room the son died in was set up.

episodes.name: The Osaka Double Mystery - Naniwa Swordsman and Toyotomi's Castle
episodes.overview: Heiji invites Conan to his kendo tournament.

episodes.name: Courtroom Battle: Kisaki vs. Kogoro (1)
episodes.overview: Eri Kisaki is the attorney for a man named Shinji Usami who is convicted for the murder of Tsuyoshi Hirasawa while in a drunken state. On the prosecution side is her rival, Reiko Kujo, dubbed “The Madonna of Prosecutors. During the hearing, Reiko calls Kogoro to the witness stand, leaving Eri baffled and Conan concerned.

episodes.name: Courtroom Battle: Kisaki vs. Kogoro (2)
episodes.overview: Conan explains that Reiko is taking advantage of Eri’s history with Kogoro by using him on her side. Kameda confesses to changing the time on Kogoro’s phone, thus destroying Shinji’s alibi.

episodes.name: The Truth Behind Valentine's (The Murder)
episodes.overview: Sonoko invites Ran, bringing along Conan and Kogoro, to come to a house in the hills where their chocolates are blessed with good fortune for love.

episodes.name: The Truth Behind Valentine's (The Reasoning)
episodes.overview: Nigaki’s corpse is left to preserve evidence. Kogoro takes Nigaki’s recorder and camera to find leads but only discovers two completely black photos and one stained with blood. Apparently the murder takes place before the snowstorm but Conan feels like there's a trick to it.

episodes.name: The Truth Behind Valentine's (The Resolution)
episodes.overview: Kogoro is tranquilized, and Conan reveals the culprit.

episodes.name: The Forgotten Memento from the Crime (1)
episodes.overview: Hideo Morita has come forth to the agency asking Kogoro to find his late wife Mrs. Morita’s watch which he has lost in his house. Kogoro refuses the problem, but the Detective Boys and Dr. Agasa offer to help.

episodes.name: The Forgotten Memento from the Crime (2)
episodes.overview: Conan does not think that Idetsuki was attacked by an outsider. The kids detect the scent of flowers coming from the microwave and Conan gets how the crime was committed. Using Agasa‘s voice, Conan reveals the murderer.

episodes.name: Secret Rushed Omission (1)
episodes.overview: Ran, feeling she met the mysterious man before, attempts to remember why.

episodes.name: Secret Rushed Omission (2)
episodes.overview: Conan's investigation leads him to discover the meaning of the symbols. He drops hints for Joseph Meguire to deduce what the symbols are.

episodes.name: Old Lady's Quiz Disappearance Case
episodes.overview: The Detective Boys meet an old woman in the park who feeds and takes care of stray cats, and also likes to give the kids quizzes from a puzzle book she has. The next day she doesn't show up to feed the cats, but the cat Bruce comes with the old lady's scarf around his neck. The scarf has a code and blood on it, and to find and save the lady Conan and the gang must solve the puzzle.

episodes.name: Truth About the Haunted House (1)
episodes.overview: Ran catches a cold and visits the doctor. When there one of the doctor's patients mentions that his apartment is haunted by a girl who was burned to death four years ago. Conan and Kogoro decide to investigate.

episodes.name: Truth About the Haunted House (2)
episodes.overview: The three people excluding the old man are given more back story. One man does not believe in the ghost, one man is a horror movie filmer, and the other man just lives there.

episodes.name: Case of the Missing Policeman's Notebook
episodes.overview: Takagi loses his badge after breaking up a fight between a manager and his singer. He searches for it with the help of the Detective Boys.

episodes.name: English Teacher vs. Great Western Detective (1)
episodes.overview: While at the Professor's, Conan recalls his last meeting with the Black Organization. Conan deduces that another Black Organization member must have been at the hotel party. This is when he finally singles out Chris Vineyard as his suspect.

episodes.name: English Teacher vs. Great Western Detective (2)
episodes.overview: Heiji immediately destroys the theory of suicide, by showing that the man who fell from his apartment attempted to grab onto the curtain to save his life.

episodes.name: The Hooligan in the Labyrinth (1)
episodes.overview: The Detective Boys and Agasa go and watch a soccer game of the Tokyo Spirits vs. Noir Tokyo. On the way back they see a very rude and loud supporter who has gotten kicked out of many stadiums for his crazy behavior. They all get on a train to go home, but as they are exiting to change trains they see the rude supporter fall on the floor with a knife in his stomach.

episodes.name: The Hooligan in the Labyrinth (2)
episodes.overview: After questioning the 3 suspects Conan still cannot determine who is the culprit, but notices that Haibara is watching the next soccer match on the subway's TV.

episodes.name: The Small Eye-Witnesses
episodes.overview: The 3 Detective Boys are playing 'make-believe detectives' when they encounter a real case. A man is killed right in front of them, wrapped up in a sheet and thrown into a truck.

episodes.name: Mystery of the Water Flowing Stone Garden (1)
episodes.overview: Kogoro, Conan, and Ran are driving in the mountains when they run out of gas and are kindly picked up by Majima, the president of a furniture company. Most of the people that work for him and live with him seem to hate him, so it isn't a surprise when Majima turns up dead the next morning in the beautiful house rock garden.

episodes.name: Mystery of the Water Flowing Stone Garden (2)
episodes.overview: Kogoro accuses one of Majima's employees who was in debt, but is quickly proven wrong. He then accuses Endou, one of Majima's company managers.

episodes.name: Chinatown Deja Vu in the Rain (1)
episodes.overview: Arguing with receptionist for free dinner ticket, one of movie director's crew invited Ran and her crews. However, the director man dies at a restaurant by cyanide but they are unable to find the source poison.

episodes.name: Chinatown Deja Vu in the Rain (2)
episodes.overview: After the case is solved, Ran falls ill. To everyone's surprise, she falls from her chair and collapses on the floor, having memories of certain people she met a long time ago. These people include Sharon Vineyard and the mysterious man.

episodes.name: Shinichi Kudo's New York Case (The Case)
episodes.overview: Ran loses consciousness due to her illness and reminisces about her past with Shinichi in New York.

episodes.name: Shinichi Kudo's New York Case (The Deduction)
episodes.overview: The performance of The Golden Apple begins. During the climax of the musical, the actor Heath Flockhart, who is portraying Paris, is shot.

episodes.name: Shinichi Kudo's New York Case (The Resolution)
episodes.overview: Shinichi tells his mother his deductions on the case to have her solve the murder.

episodes.name: Mitsuhiko in a Forest of Indecision (1)
episodes.overview: Mitsuhiko is missing during the radio taiso day. The Detective Boys ask about his whereabouts from Mitsuhiko's sister and learn he had been going out to an unknown location for the past few Sundays.

episodes.name: Mitsuhiko in a Forest of Indecision (2)
episodes.overview: Conan's radar runs out of power forcing the group to search for Mitsuhiko in the forest.

episodes.name: Solitary Island of the Princess and the Dragon King's Palace (The Murder)
episodes.overview: Heiji and Kogoro are invited to Okinawa to solve the case of a body that was found on Onikame Island alongside a mysterious carved message by the body.

episodes.name: Solitary Island of the Princess and the Dragon King's Palace (The Investigation)
episodes.overview: Heiji tells them the Anchor he found was approximately four to five years old, the same time period on which the strange events have been occurring on Onikame.

episodes.name: Solitary Island of the Princess and the Dragon King's Palace (The Resolution)
episodes.overview: When Conan and Heiji find the name "Kaa" and "Chi" written by Miyako many years ago, they realize who the names are referring to. Conan and Heiji have an epiphany and realize the culprit faked Tiara's time of death.
