episodes.overview: Conan, Ayumi, Genta, Mitsuhiko, Haibara, and Detectives Takagi and Sato decipher the code Detective Date left in his notebook and arrive at café Poirot. They deduce the ransom handoff method described by the kidnapper based on information left at Poirot and successfully rescue Alan, the son of the vice president of a French car maker. The case seems resolved until they learn Alan was being held captive along with his friend Inukai Yuji. They must deduce the location where he is being held based on Alan's time in the car.

episodes.name: Rube Goldberg Machine (1)
episodes.overview: A job brings Conan, Ran, and Kogoro to a resort area in Gunma Prefecture, where they run into Inspector Yamamura investigating a case. Inoue Kohei was murdered by Rube Goldberg Machine, a device made up of a chain reaction of many simple gimmicks.

episodes.name: Rube Goldberg Machine (2)
episodes.overview: When the contraption that was used to kill the victim is found, the falling chimney incident at the resort area Conan, Ran, and Kogoro were visiting is investigated as a homicide. Several of the victim's acquaintances are staying nearby, so they go to question them. The victim's wife, the company's president and CEO, an old friend and shareholder, an investor with whom the victim had a rocky relationship, and the victim's mistress are all suspects. They discover one of the suspects is rather knowledgeable about the type of device found at the villa and becomes the prime suspect, but...

episodes.name: Last Dinner for You
episodes.overview: Conan, Ran, and Kogoro come across an Italian restaurant on fire. A nearby man rushes inside the building. In an attempt to stop him, Kogoro follows him inside, where he discovers a body. The police investigation identifies the victim as Head Chef Marcello. The man who rushed into the building was Akiyama the waiter. Later, the owner Kurasaka, his daughter Mariko, and the victim's wife Arisa arrive. The police believe a burglar broke into the closed restaurant and ran into the victim while he was cooking, but...

episodes.name: The Holed-Up Sensation
episodes.overview: A man armed with a gun shows up in a residential neighborhood. He takes a woman hostage and holes up inside a nearby home. Conan and Kogoro rush to the scene after seeing the situation on TV. The police are confused by the culprit's nonsensical demands. The homeowner arrives and tells the police not to worry about breaking down doors or walls since the home is vacant and will be demolished the next day. While they're talking outside, two gunshots are heard from inside the house...

episodes.name: Chihaya and Jugo's Matchmaking Party (1)
episodes.overview: Conan, Ran, and Kogoro are refused entry to a restaurant, privatized that day to host a masked party for singles. Participating in this event, Inspector Yokomizo meets Chihaya, and both will be confronted with a murder...

episodes.name: Chihaya and Jugo's Matchmaking Party (2)
episodes.overview: Faced with a murder committed during a singles' masked party, the police try to find the culprit among three suspects. Nothing conclusive emerges from their interrogation, but Conan notices an important detail...

episodes.name: Karate Teacher Mori Ran
episodes.overview: Ran steps in as a temporary karate instructor when the dojo's regular instructor is injured. Just as the class is ending, a scream is heard from the second floor.

episodes.name: Girls Day Mystery 2
episodes.overview: While the boys relax at a hot spring, the girls happen to meet up at a snowy mountain resort. They are enjoying their day together when they discover that strange pranks have been happening at the resort.

episodes.name: The Four-Person Class Reunion
episodes.overview: Detective Kogoro is asked to be the bodyguard of the owner of a high-end host club. On the first day of his duties, he finds the owner dead in his own pool. It looks like one of the members of his annual four-person class reunion may be responsible.

episodes.name: Mystery of the Lost Treasure
episodes.overview: Conan accompanies Sonoko to the studio of a famous potter. While there, Conan discovers that one of his pottery pieces has been broken, and worse, that the piece was already sold! It will take Conan's skills in deductive reasoning to figure out the culprit.

episodes.name: The Dangerous Melon Field
episodes.overview: Detective Kogoro is asked to investigate the damages and theft of a melon farmer's crops. While at the farm, there are several mysteries they will have to solve...

episodes.name: Stakeout 3
episodes.overview: The kids assist Detective Takagi in trying to catch a murderer. They have to stakeout a bakery to try to find the culprit. Can they focus on solving the crime instead of focusing on pastries and sweets from the bakery?

episodes.name: The Body on the Gunma-Nagano Border (1)
episodes.overview: Detective Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are in Gunma after solving a missing persons case when Detective Mori calls Detective Yamamura. Detective Yamamura asks Detective Mori for help with a murder that took place directly on the border between Gunma and Nagano.

episodes.name: The Body on the Gunma-Nagano Border (2)
episodes.overview: Detective Yamamura's past holds a key to solving the mystery of the murder on the border between Gunma and Nagano. With the best detectives on the scene, can they solve this murder mystery? Did the victim leave any clues behind?

episodes.name: The Case of Ayumi's Illustrated Diary 4
episodes.overview: Ayumi is tired of so many peaceful days in a row and enlists the help of the Detective Boys to hunt for a case. Unfortunately, when one goes looking for trouble, that is exactly what they usually find.

episodes.name: The Detective Who Lost His Mind
episodes.overview: Detective Kogoro is called upon by a beautiful client. Fortunately, Ran sends Conan with her father, since she knows he has a penchant for being blinded by pretty women.

episodes.name: Interrogation Room 2
episodes.overview: A former grade school teacher confesses to committing a murder, but the more the police question him, the more questionable his testimony sounds.

episodes.name: Conan and Megure's Two Hostages (1)
episodes.overview: While at a bookstore, Conan stumbles upon a note from a child named Kazuo who's been kidnapped. Conan is able to switch places with Kazuo, but will he be able to outwit the kidnappers and escape himself?

episodes.name: Conan and Megure's Two Hostages (2)
episodes.overview: Conan helps the married couple that kidnapped Kazuo, doing his best to make sure that their child, Tetsuya, is safely reunited with them. But what fate lays in wait for Kazuo?

episodes.name: The Suspected Infidelity of the Triple Collab (1)
The Suspected Infidelity of the Triple Collab (2)
episodes.overview: A poisoning occurs at the restaurant where Conan and the Detective Boys are dining, but without knowing how to plant the poison, the investigation grinds to a halt. Detective Kobayashi looks to Conan for advice.

episodes.name: Tsuburaya Mitsuhiko's Detective Notes 3
episodes.overview: At the venue for the "North American Flower Festival: Audition for the Role of the Lord," Mitsuhiko, Ayumi, and Genta encounter Makio Yuita and Kōzō Yuita, who are arguing. After Makio leaves, the remaining Kōzō explains that the two of them are brothers who happened to meet at the audition venue.

episodes.name: Best Husband
episodes.overview: Conan, Ran, and Kogoro visit the home of politician Reiko Mutsu. They are guided by her secretary, Shinji Inui, and wait inside the mansion, but Reiko doesn't appear for some time. Suddenly, Reiko's scream echoes through the mansion.

episodes.name: Misfortune of the Positive Man
episodes.overview: Conan and the Detective Boys become acquainted with a kind man named Shojichi Aida. While heading to Aida's apartment, they encounter a quarrel between his neighbor, Nenji Kotakara, and the landlord, Teruyo Imaizumi.

episodes.name: Ooka Momiji's Sweet Trap (1)
episodes.overview: A stage play modeled after Kogoro and Heiji is being planned, and Conan and the others have come to Kyoto for a meeting. When they visit the director's home, they find the producer, stage manager, and scriptwriter there.

episodes.name: Ooka Momiji's Sweet Trap (2)
episodes.overview: Conan, Kogoro, and Heiji are at the home of the director, Kabumoto, for a meeting about a stage play. Present are also Momiji Ooka, who claims to be Heiji's fiancée, and Hyoe Kuroda, an officer from the Metropolitan Police Department.

episodes.name: The Secret of the Popular Restaurant's Changing Flavor
episodes.overview: The Detective Boys are distressed to discover the flavor of popular ramen shop Ogataken's flavor has changed, so they head to the restaurant to investigate.

episodes.name: The Moving Police Box
episodes.overview: The Detective Boys help with the unveiling of a mobile police box car. While the vehicle is touring around, it is hijacked by some robbers, and everyone onboard is taken hostage.

episodes.name: The Sister Troubled by Her Naughty Brother
episodes.overview: Shigatsu Makabe comes to the Mouri Detective Agency with a request after malicious flyers were posted on his apartment condominium. Kogoro, who was conducting surveillance at the condominium, apprehends a suspicious young man, but... a few days later, a body is found in a unit of a luxury condominium.

episodes.name: Girls Day Mystery 3
episodes.overview: The "Five Female Detectives" aka Ran, Sonoko, Haibara, Ayumi and Detective Sato sense a suspicious high-paying part-time job advertisement that involves "dressing as ninjas and going to designated locations" to hint at a crime, and decide to go undercover to investigate.

episodes.name: The Mori Family House Sits
episodes.overview: Kogoro receives a request from literary critic Takahiko Kamiyu to stay at his house while he goes to the countryside for three days. He plans to turn down the offer, as it doesn't seem like detective work, but for the high pay, all he has to do is look after the pet cat, and the only thing that bothers him is the noise from the construction work that starts on the second day. Kogoro accepts the favorable conditions, which include free use of alcohol and food in the house, and the right to invite Conan and Ran. However, while he is relaxing at the Kamiyu residence, one visitor after another begins to arrive...
